info.title: API Platform's demo
info.description:
This is a demo application of the [API Platform](https://api-platform.com) framework.
[Its source code](https://github.com/api-platform/demo) includes various examples, check it out!
You may also be interested by [the GraphQL entrypoint](/graphql).
[A PWA](/) and [an admin](/admin) are consuming this API.

author.description: The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

publicationDate.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the item was added to a DataFeed.
